original_title: Retired teachers to be recruited for A/L paper marking
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Examinations has decided to invite applications from retired teachers for the evaluation of the Advanced Level answer scripts.
In a statement, the Department of Examinations said that applications will be invited from teachers who retired after December 31, 2022.
Accordingly, it is stated in the notification that it is possible to apply for the evaluation of the Advanced Level answer scripts online from 2nd May.
Teachers who have not applied for the evaluation of the Advanced Level answer scripts can also apply.
